name: Pegasus
description: A magnificent, winged horse characterized by its grace and beauty, the Pegasus has powerful wings and a large horse-like frame.
memorable: Pegasus is not only a fast and agile flier but also serves as a loyal mount and protector to its rider.
goals: To serve virtuous mortals and defend the realms, embodying freedom and purity.
relations: Often found alongside good-aligned creatures or deities, and may bond with virtuous riders.
environment: Can be found in celestial realms or in places where good-aligned beings reside.
strengths: High mobility in the air, resistance to radiant damage, and advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Moderate Armor Class makes it somewhat vulnerable to attacks.
attacks: Deals substantial bludgeoning damage with its hooves and can knock adversaries prone.
most_powerful_ability: Diving Pounce allows powerful attacks after flying towards a target.
senses: Possesses keen perception with a passive score of 17, enabling it to detect hidden foes.
skills: Skilled in perception, making it reliable for detecting ambushes.
additional_information: Forms a bond with a rider, enhancing both their effectiveness.
Can catch its rider to prevent dismounting in critical moments.
Has magic weapon attacks that overcome resistances.
Can perform a multiattack with its hooves.
Radiates a Good aura, affecting other creatures' behavior.
test_queries: noble winged horse that serves good
fast flying mount with healing aura
